title: How to Delete Internet History on a 3DS

steps.headline: Turn on your 3DS.
steps.description: If it was on Sleep Mode, open it.

steps.headline: Go to the Internet.
steps.description: You can do this by tapping the globe icon in the upper right-hand corner of the main menu.

steps.headline: Go to "Options" in the Internet menu.
steps.description: You can do this by pressing the wrench icon on the bottom-left corner.

steps.headline: Scroll down until you find  "Remove History".
steps.description: Press it. Tap "Yes". This will delete your browser history.

steps.headline: Just below it, press "Delete Cookies".
steps.description: Hit "Delete". This removes any viruses, personal information, or log-ins.

steps.headline: Under the Internet menu, press "Bookmarks".
steps.description: Choose the Bookmark you want to erase. Tap the wrench icon next to it. Tap "Remove Bookmark". Hit "Delete". This will delete the page you have bookmarked.

text: Turn on your 3DS. If it was on Sleep Mode, open it. Go to the Internet. You can do this by tapping the globe icon in the upper right-hand corner of the main menu. Go to "Options" in the Internet menu. You can do this by pressing the wrench icon on the bottom-left corner. Scroll down until you find  "Remove History". Press it. Tap "Yes". This will delete your browser history. Just below it, press "Delete Cookies". Hit "Delete". This removes any viruses, personal information, or log-ins. Under the Internet menu, press "Bookmarks". Choose the Bookmark you want to erase. Tap the wrench icon next to it. Tap "Remove Bookmark". Hit "Delete". This will delete the page you have bookmarked.
